text: // Move any i18n files that are located in the core downloads dir to the i18n downloads dir. The spring // application context will not load properly (for some unknown reason) when there are i18n jars in the // classpath. So as a work-around, we simply ensure that they are where they should be anyway. // Previously we were not as careful about this, so it is possible that i18n jars were copied into the // core downloads directory.
label: IMPLEMENTATION
